title: Amazon ECS SaaS - Reference Architecture
description: The AWS SaaS Factory ECS SaaS Reference Architecture is a example architecture that illustrates how to build and manage multi-tenant Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) applications using Amazon Elastic Container Service (ECS). It serves as a guide for developers looking to implement best practices in building multi-tenant SaaS applications on AWS using ECS, offering a flexible and scalable solution tailored to various business needs.
